mapper.select: select to_char(fcal.createtime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') createtime, fcal.uidcount as applycount, fcal.filename from factory_code_apply_log fcal, (select fwmcode from primary_code where carton_code=#{qrCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) f where fcal.filename=f.fwmcode

select to_char(min(prodate), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') firstprodate, to_char(max(prodate), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') lastprodate, count(*) uploadcount from upload_produce_report upr, (select carton_code from primary_code where fwmcode=#{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) cc where upr.boxcode=cc.carton_code

select count(*) outcount, to_char(min(makedate), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') firstoutdate, to_char(max(makedate), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') lastoutdate from take_ticket_idcode tti, (select carton_code from primary_code where fwmcode=#{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) cc where tti.idcode=cc.carton_code
